alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 1:32PM CDT until May 13 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pemiscot County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Steele, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Steele, Cooter, Deering, Holland, Bragg City, Rives, Bowie Corner, Braggadocio, West Hermondale, Samford, New Survey, Channel, Denton, Gobler, Covington, Tinkerville, Shade, Bakerville, Hermondale and Canady. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
